publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-7191 Maureen Watt: International Success for SeaEnergy Renewablesâ€”That the Parliament congratulates SeaEnergy Renewables on successfully securing its first foreign contract to build a series of projects in the Taiwan Strait with a gross generating capacity of 1.8 gigawatt; believes that this is the kind of example of a Scottish renewables company exporting its expertise and equipment that bodes well for the future of the industry, and looks forward to other Scottish renewables companies making their presence felt on the international market in coming years.
